name: @vtfk/utilities
description: A collection of uncategorized javascript functionality used in multiple projects

scripts.patch: npm run prepublish && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.minor: npm run prepublish && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.major: npm run prepublish && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.refresh: del-cli node_modules && del-cli package-lock.json && npm i

author: Karl-Einar Bergstr√∏m
